shortdesc.ph: Callback for changes in remote video publishing state.
Callback when the remote video state changes.

p.codeblock: virtual void onUserMuteVideo(uid_t uid, bool muted)
public void onUserMuteVideo(int uid, boolean muted)

section.p: This callback is triggered when the remote user calls to stop or resume publishing the video stream. The SDK reports the remote user's video publishing state to the local user.
When a remote user calls , the SDK triggers this callback to report the remote user's video stream state to the local user.
section.note: This callback may be inaccurate when the number of users (in communication scenario) or hosts (in live broadcast scenario) in the channel exceeds 32.
When the number of users in a communication scenario or hosts in an ultra-low latency live streaming scenario exceeds 32, this callback may be inaccurate.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when a remote user calls to stop or resume publishing video streams.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.

Whether the remote user stops publishing the video stream:
: The remote user stops publishing the video stream.
: The remote user resumes publishing the video stream.

Whether the remote user stops publishing video streams:
: The remote user stops publishing video streams.
: The remote user resumes publishing video streams.
